analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 79.82 indicates overbought territory, suggesting caution for long positions. Money Flow Index at 78.05 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Stochastic at 82.40 warns of overbought exhaustion.

indicator_insights.rsi: Overbought at 79.8, profit-taking likely. Caution for new longs.

indicator_insights.stochastic: Extreme overbought at 82.4, bearish divergence possible.
indicator_insights.macd: Early bullish crossover below zero. Recovery phase initiated, watch for confirmation.
indicator_insights.bollinger_bands: Price holding above midline. Bullish bias maintained, support at 0.87918.
indicator_insights.moving_average: Price 0.03% above MA. Uptrend confirmed, MA acting as dynamic support.
indicator_insights.parabolic_sar: SAR positioned below price at 0.87792. Uptrend active, trailing stop recommended.
indicator_insights.ichimoku: Tenkan/Kijun bearish cross detected. Trend reversal warning, risk management critical.
